ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: This work was supported by grants from the National Natural Science Foundation of China (No. 81803744, 81773919); “Significant new drugs creation” Special Science and Technology Major (2019ZX09301133); Shaanxi Province Technology Innovation Guide Special Project (2018HJCG‐21); Shaanxi Province Innovative Talent Promotion Plan (2018TD‐005); The Youth of Innovation Team of Shaanxi Universities.
